import pysan as ps
dir(ps)

ps.subsequences.get_ndistinct_subsequences([1,2,3,2,2,3,2])

58
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from pysan.core import plot_sequence

sequence = [1,1,2,1,2,2,3,1,1,2,2,1,2,2,3,1,1,2]
plt = plot_sequence(sequence)
plt.show()

from pysan.subsequences import get_subsequences

get_subsequences(sequence)
